author: SpaceX
tuit: Dennis Tito, the world's first space tourist, plans to take his wife Akiko on a belated honeymoon to the moon

author: Elon Musk
tuit: We might need a different name, as this is basically just Starlink with roaming capability, so you can take your terminal anywhere.

content.author: Elon Musk
content.tuit: From training to launch to landing, this all-access docuseries rides along with the Inspiration4 crew on the first all-civilian orbital space.
